articles.content:

articles.title: Power Rankings, Part 2: Play-in Contenders, Playoff Locks, and the Rockets - The Ringer
articles.description: Can Russell Westbrook and Zion Williamson power the Wizards and Pelicans into the playoffs? Will Solo Steph be unleashed in Golden State? And what the hell will happen in Houston?
articles.content: Welcome to my annual preseason power rankings, in which I slot all 30 teams into tiers. For each team, well look at a topic, theme, or specific player that stands out to me. Last week, we looked at t… [+14971 chars]
